ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work is based on the research supported wholly or in part by the National Research Foundation of South Africa (Grant Numbers: 64813). The opinions, findings, and conclusions or recommendations expressed are those of the author(s) alone, and the NRF accepts no liability whatsoever in this regard. The authors are grateful to the Cape Peninsula University of Technology, Agrifood Technology Station in South Africa for providing the oil press that was used to cold press the pomegranate seed oil.
